title: Jelly Restaurant
description: Jelly Restaurant combines simple casual arcade gameplay with a restaurant management game. Enjoy the satisfactory jelly movement. Fit the bottom color of the jelly with the surface color to make the jelly grow bigger. Pay attention to any obstacles and sharp knives. The bigger jelly you get, the more jellies you can produce. Manage your restaurant by hiring helpers, expanding your restaurant, and serving colorful jellies to your customers. Have a great business!
